summary: A ranger whose passion is nude painting comes to work in a remote Bosnian village. He asks the local women to pose naked for him. They are shy at first, but they eventually agree to do so. ... See full summary Â»
cast: Stojan 'Stole' Arandjelovic|Bozidarka Frajt|Uros Kravljaca|Zaim Muzaferija|Jadranka Matkovic|Spela Rozin|Miodrag Brezo|Ratko Petkovic|Adnan Palangic|Halima Music
title: Zena s krajolikom
